column3: Thanks and Concept ACK, happy to welcome you as a maintainer. It is good to see your contributions in the areas where we previously had a lack of contributors and reviewers!
Once (and if) this is merged, you can refer to the doc on how to setup the merge script: https://github.com/bitcoin-core/bitcoin-maintainer-tools/pull/89
There is also a list of maintainers in [REVIEWERS](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/2e9031f95d2bf8d0134103a10a8a2162975f1259/REVIEWERS)

Welcome !

> It is assumed that my responsibility will be limited to the GUI repo.

Yes, for now !
I mean don't forget I started as GUI maintainer as well :sweat_smile:
